alert.note: Alert for Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 2:50PM CST until January 15 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM FRIDAY TO 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Clay County. In Nebraska, Dixon County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
